document.full_text: a new jersey defense contractor pleaded guilty to fraud after helicopter parts and other items he claimed were made in the united states turned out to be foreign-manufactured and reportedly failed during use, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: nj defense contractor admits fraud over parts made outside u.s
lines_and_colors: a new jersey defense contractor pleaded guilty to fraud after helicopter parts and other items he claimed were made in the united states turned out to be foreign-manufactured and reportedly failed during use, authorities said on tuesday.
